Hello, I am Junjie Wen, you can also call me Lesjie. I am a third-year master student in East China Normal University(ECNU) advised by Chaomin Shen. I am also an embodied intelligence algorithm intern at Midea Group. Besides, I received my Bachelor degree in Software Engineering at Southwest Jiao Tong university(SWJTU).

If you are interested in robotics or my work, please directly contact with me.

My research interests lies at robot learning, embodied intelligence, vision language action models.
